data.title: Status Quo 'Official Archive Series' 'Vol. 2
data.meta_description: Status Quo 'Official Archive Series''Vol. 2 - Live In London' released December 1st A first musical foretaste with ‘Rockin’ All Over The World’available todayThis series features a curated selection of iconic Status Quo performances, showcasing their enduring popularity and musical uniqueness. With exceptional quality and future releases to come, this collectible series celebrates Status Quo's electrifying rock 'n' roll experience.
data.text:
Status Quo is delighted to announce the release of the second volume of the new ‘Official Archive Series’ brought to you by earMUSIC. ‘Vol. 2 – Live In London’ will be released on December 1st, 2023, once again as strictly limited and numbered 2CD and 3LP vinyl editions, as well as digital download and streaming. As with each forthcoming release in this series, this official and fully endorsed recording features a carefully curated selection of iconic Status Quo performances, including classic hits spanning their extensive catalog, deep cuts, and fan favourites. ‘Vol. 2 – Live In London’ holds up the standards set with ‘Vol. 1 – Live In Amsterdam’, and is a definite gem in any record collection.

The ‘Official Archive Series’ offers exceptional sound quality and great packaging throughout, featuring photography by Christie Goodwin. The Series has been newly mixed and mastered by Eike Freese and Laurin Halberstadt at Chameleon Studios Hamburg.

‘Vol. 2 – Live In London’ was a hometown show recorded on 19 December 2012 on the band’s ‘Quo Festive’ tour, getting people into the pre-Christmas mood. The setlist at the O2 Arena saw Francis Rossi, Rick Parfitt, Andrew Bown, John ‘Rhino’ Edwards and Matt Letley [in his last UK show as Quo drummer] deliver an avalanche of classics, and even features a Christmas Medley, including ‘Walking In A Winter Wonderland’, ‘Rockin’ Around The Christmas Tree’ and Quo’s own ‘It’s Christmas Time’.

From today, Status Quo is providing a first musical preview with the digital release of the powerful live performance of ‘Rockin’ All Over The World’.

‘Vol. 2 – Live In London’ is a further release of the Status Quo ‘Official Archive Series’ presenting the raw energy and infectious enthusiasm of a Status Quo live performance; no matter where in the world. With their trademark sound, powerful guitar riffs, and irresistible hooks, the band delivers an unadulterated rock ’n’ roll experience, and this collectible series is a great way to celebrate one of the greatest live acts of all time.

Status Quo – Official Archive Series Vol. 2 – Live In London

Album release: 1 December 2023

Formats:

Ltd. 2CD Digipak

Ltd. 3LP (Black Vinyl/180g/Gatefold)

Digital

Track listing:

CD 1

1. Intro

2. Caroline

3. Paper Plane

4. Hold You Back

5. Rain

6. Mystery Song

7. Rock ‘N’ Roll ‘N’ You

8. Beginning Of The End

9. The Proposing Medley

10. The Oriental

CD 2

11. Creepin’ Up On You

12. Marguerita Time

13. Living On An Island

14. In The Army Now

15. Drum Solo

16. Roll Over Lay

17. Down Down

18. Whatever You Want

19. Rockin’ All Over The World

20. The Christmas Medley

21. Burning Bridges

Vinyl Side Split:

A: 1-5; B 6-8

C: 9-10; D: 11-15

E: 16-18; F: 19-21
